reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]
reload.description: Reloads trend sensors from the YAML-configuration.

min_samples_larger_max_samples.title: Configured min_samples larger than max_samples for {device_id}
min_samples_larger_max_samples.description: The configured minimum of samples ({min_samples}) is larger than the configured maximum of samples ({max_samples}) for the binary sensor '{device_id}'. To resolve this please check your YAML-configuration.
